extendedInfo.description: Turn your phone or tablet into an air traffic radar and see airplane traffic around the world move in real-time. Discover why millions are already using Flightradar24.Flightradar24 is, or has been the number one travel app in more than 60 countries including the United Statesm, Germany, France, United Kingdom, Japan, and Australia. We are frequently featured in the media and recent media mentions include BBC (UK), Bild (Germany), Le Monde (France), CNN (US), Fox News (US), and MSNBC (US).Features that have made Flightradar24 the bestselling flight-tracking app around the world include: * Comprehensive information for each individual plane, including route, speed, altitude and more* Real-time flight status information (for most planes), including scheduled time of departure, actual time of departure, scheduled time of arrival, and estimated time of arrival* Augmented reality view â identify the planes flying overhead by simply pointing your phoneâs camera to the sky* Easy to search for a specific flight* Unrivaled global coverage of real-time positional data for aircraft* Filter by airline, altitude, speed and more* Emergency squawk sush notification alerts* Flight trails and callsigns directly on map* See airline logos in connection with the aircraft* Banner freeCOVERAGEWe are rapidly improving Flightradar24âs coverage across the world. Below is a breakdown of our coverage as of April 2013. For the most up-to-date info about coverage in the area(s) you are interested in, please visit http://www.flightradar24.com* EUROPERoughly 95% of the continent covered* AMERICA100% coverage in the US and Canada (but with slight delay) thanks to radar data provided by the FAA. Real-time coverage for ADS-B equipped aircraft in most areas of the two countries.Substantial coverage in Mexico and most South American countries including Brazil, Argentina, and Chile*ASIAComplete coverage in Japan. Substantial to complete coverage in Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Maldives, Philippines, Taiwan, South Korea, Thailand, Iraq, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Pakistan, Bangladesh and many other countries.*OCEANIANearly complete coverage in Australia and New Zealand.*AFRICASubstantial coverage in South Africa. Limited coverage in the rest of the region.    Please note that coverage will vary.Find out how you can help increase Flightradar24's coverage in your region:http://www.flightradar24.com/increase-coverageIMPORTANT INFORMATION Please note that Flightradar24 only can track aircraft equipped with an ADS-B transponder. The exception is in the US and Canada where we get radar data from the FAA and can track almost all planes, but with a five-minute delay. Visit http://www.flightradar24.com for more information about ADS-B and Flightradar24âs coverage.Minimum screen resolution required to run this app is 320x480px.CONNECT WITH FLIGHTRADAR24Like us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/flightradar24 and follow us on Twitter http://www.twitter.com/flightradar24 for the latest on Flightradar24.HELP & SUPPORTPlease visit the Flightradar24 forum for help and support.http://forum.flightradar24.com/threads/89-Important-Read-this-before-you-ask-questionsDISCLAIMERThe use of the information presented in Flightradar24 is strictly limited to your personal enthusiast activities (i.e. for entertainment purposes), which specifically exclude any activities that might endanger yourself or the lives of others. Under no circumstances will the developer of this application be held responsible for incidents resulting from the use and/or interpretation of the data in the application. We reserve the right to anonymously track and report a user's activity inside of app.

reviews.title: Excellent and well worth purchasing.
reviews.comment: This app works perfectly on my S3 4G. Love the new 3D view. Great work guys.
reviews.author: Adam McMillan

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: In the past I was critical of certain updates but hats off to the team as right now they\'ve got this App spot on!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Much better
reviews.comment: I\'m liking this app!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Few errors
reviews.comment: I love this app. 2 big issues and 1 small issue. Two big is \'data update interval\' and \'aircraft images\' crashes the app when I click them. Also, I would like to see an adjustment option for the heading circle in AR view. Overall awesome app :)
reviews.author: BuilderzGames MC

reviews.title: Nexus 7  great.
reviews.comment: Use it often. Great on the tablet. Some aircraft that fly overhead don\'t appear, but generally quite accurate. Looking forward to more innovative updates.  Thanks for the prompt support for earlier issue. Impressive. 6 stars!

reviews.title: Love the app so much!
reviews.comment: I LOVE the new 3D feature, and I can\'t wait to see this addition progress and be updated! One issue though, the 7700 squawk notifications appear to come through twice which is quite annoying. Apart from that, it\'s awesome!
reviews.author: Elliott Cumming

reviews.title: Love you  Flight Radar...
reviews.comment: Make sure you reply saying..... Love you too.... Lol.. Kidding.......
reviews.author: Sparsh Bhatia

reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Jason King

reviews.comment: Loving the new 3D feature already
reviews.author: Robert Davis

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: For plane enthusiasts this is great. For not so enthusiastic still great.  Show people this app and look at their faces when they see how busy the airways are. Works flawlessly on Samsung galaxy note.
reviews.author: Mark Jones

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: 3D implementation is absolutely brilliant !!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AR is horific!
reviews.comment: Please improve the AR!!! My S3 works great when using AR with Night Sky applications (to watch stars and constelations), but with airplanes it is not even close to average! With iPhone 4 it works great on the other hand. Please improve it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better
reviews.comment: Definitely improved.
reviews.author: Steve Durrant

reviews.title: Brilliant app
reviews.comment: Well worth the money.
reviews.author: Paul Woodhouse

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: This is a \"must have\" app for aviation lovers!
reviews.author: Sila Kayo

reviews.title: Best flight scanner app.
reviews.comment: Huge improvements, now works perfectly on my nexus 7 & nexus 10. 3D view and regular updates are also plus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 3D I love it
reviews.comment: I like it, it might not show every aircraft in the sky but it\'s good. Thanks for keeping this going from strength to strength!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: great app. worth buying.
reviews.author: Sagi Barak

reviews.title: like new update
reviews.comment: Like the new update with the 3D, please don\'t stuff it up again. BTW, why you can not make Android the same as Apple application? I know I won\'t get a reply back for this comment. Make as good as Apple and more than happy to give 5 star. I think that\'s fair?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: The whole things great!
reviews.author: Daniel Booth
